original_text: Lord, your beautiful throne is high above. You have ruled there from the beginning. That is where we worship you. 17: This may be speaking about the temple in Jerusalem which was on a high hill, Mount Zion. Lord, your beautiful throne is high above.
korean_text: 영화로우신 보좌여 시작부터 높이 계시며 우리의 성소이시며

sentences.original_text: Lord, your beautiful throne is high above.
sentences.korean_translation: 주님, 당신의 아름다운 보좌는 높은 곳에 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: You have ruled there from the beginning.
That is where we worship you.
This may be speaking about the temple in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 예루살렘의 성전에 대해 말하는 것일 수 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: which was on a high hill, Mount Zion.
sentences.korean_translation: 성전은 높은 언덕인 시온 산 위에 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Lord, your beautiful throne is high above.
sentences.korean_translation: 주님, 당신의 아름다운 보좌는 높은 곳에 있습니다.
